thread.title: Salman Khan Struggles To Get Up From His Seat In This Viral Video! Fans Say 'Our Legend Is Getting Old' - WATCH
thread.title_full: Salman Khan Struggles To Get Up From His Seat In This Viral Video! Fans Say 'Our Legend Is Getting Old' - WATCH

author: @spotboye
title: Salman Khan Struggles To Get Up From His Seat In This Viral Video! Fans Say 'Our Legend Is Getting Old' - WATCH
text: Salman Khan Struggles To Get Up From His Seat In This Viral Video! Fans Say 'Our Legend Is Getting Old' - WATCH Salman Khan fans are concerned off late to see their superstar struggling to get up from his seat in a recent public event, take a look at the video below Bollywood superstar Salman Khan recently sparked concern among his fans after a video of him struggling to stand up at an event in Mumbai went viral. The 58-year-old actor, known for his enduring presence in the industry, attended the event with his sister Alvira and was joined by his Hum Saath Saath Hain co-star Sonali Bendre. The video shows Salman attempting to rise from his seat to greet Sonali, but visibly struggling and requiring support from the sofa before managing to stand and hug her. ALSO READ: [Salman Khan Dances To ‘Jalwa,’ Sings At An Event In Mumbai; Netizens Mock The Actor, Say, ‘Ab Nahi Hota Bhaijan Se’](https://www.spotboye.com/bollywood/news/salman-khan-dances-to-jalwa-sings-at-an-event-in-mumbai-netizens-mock-the-actor-say-ab-nahi-hota-bhaijan-se/66cf262690e06b057b60ed1c) The video quickly caught the attention of fans and social media users, many of whom expressed their concern about the actor’s health and the inevitable effects of aging. Comments poured in from netizens, with some expressing sadness over seeing their favorite hero showing signs of getting older. "Feels sad to see your fav hero getting old," one user commented, while another acknowledged, "He is 58..If he's still working, kudos to him!" Others echoed similar sentiments, noting, "Our childhood hero is getting old" and "Legend is getting old!" ALSO READ: [Bigg Boss 18: Stree 2's Sarkata Sunil Kumar, Viral Spiritual Guru Aniruddhacharya Approached For Salman Khan's Reality Show](https://www.spotboye.com/television/television-news/bigg-boss-18-stree-2-s-sarkata-sunil-kumar-viral-spiritual-guru-aniruddhacharya-approached-for-salman-khan-s-reality-show/66cefb5d90e06b057b60ec5c) Adding to the concern, reports indicated that Salman had recently suffered an injury to his ribs, further fueling worries about his health. Fans flooded social media with well-wishes, hoping for a speedy recovery for the actor who has long been a fixture in Bollywood. Despite these concerns, Salman Khan’s professional life remains as busy as ever. The actor has several high-profile projects lined up, ensuring his continued presence on the big screen. He is set to star in Sikandar, directed by Ghajini fame AR Murugadoss, and has another film with Karan Johar in the works. Additionally, Salman is expected to reunite with veteran filmmaker Sooraj Barjatya for yet another collaboration, promising more to come from the beloved superstar despite the challenges he faces. Image Source: Instagram - Trending
